title: LMS Development Course Based on Contextual Instructional Design for Nursing Continuing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Clinical Nursing Practice Experience and Basic Computer Literacy
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment with hands-on learning activities in a provided-digital-device environment, targeting advanced nursing professionals for software development education

learning_goals: Core modules for a nursing continuing education LMS can be designed by applying contextual instructional design principles
An educational software prototype can be implemented according to the learning management system (LMS) development process
The educational effectiveness of developed software can be analyzed, and improvement suggestions can be provided through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
